Reference

Handle the configuration file

create_config()

Create a configuration file

default_config() example_config() get_config()

Create a path pointing to a configuration file

edit_config()

Edit the default configuration file

show_config()

Show a configuration file

Paths pointing to 2dii's dropbox-folder

MASTER.DATA.PATH() FIN.DATA.PATH() CBMARKET.DATA.PATH() DATA.STORE.PATH() ANALYSIS.INPUTS.PATH()

Create paths to specific 2dii directories, depending on a configuration file

USER.NAME() DROPBOX.PATH() GIT.PATH() WEBTOOL.PATH() COMPANY.PATH() dbox_port_00() SCENARIO.DATA.PATH() dbox_port2_10proj() EQMARKET.DATA.PATH() MARKET.DATA.PATH() INDEX.DATA.PATH() INDEX.RESULTS.DATA.PATH() FUND.DATA.PATH()

Create paths to specific 2dii directories

find_dropbox_2dii() path_dropbox_2dii()

Easily access directories in your local copy of 2dii's Dropbox folder

Access configuration parameters

FINANCIAL.TIMESTAMP() timestamps_datastore_export() FINANCIAL.TIMESTAMP() ALD.TIMESTAMP() DATASTORE.TIMESTAMP() DATAPREP.TIMESTAMP() START.YEAR() TIME.HORIZON() RISK.YEAR() ADDITIONAL.YEAR() TECH.LIST() TECH.EXCLUDE() SECTOR.LIST() OTHER.SECTOR.LIST() SCENARIO.SOURCES.LIST() IEA.SCENARIO.LIST() WEB.REGION.LIST() SCENARIO.GEOGRAPHIES.LIST() EQUITY.MARKET.LIST() GLOBAL.AGGREGATE.SECTOR.LIST() GLOBAL.AGGREGATE.SCENARIO.SOURCES.LIST() CREATE.META.PORTFOLIO() META.INVESTOR.NAME() META.PORTFOLIO.NAME() HasBV() HasRISK() HasMAP() HasSB() inc_metaportfolio() inc_project_metaportfolio() allowable_asset_list()

Access parameters from a configuration file

get_param()

Create functions to access configuration parameters

Handle unclean names

clean_column_names()

A version of janitor::clean_names() that also cleans dplyr groups

clean_quo()

Clean quosure expressions

quo_chr()

Convert quosure expressions to character

unclean_column_names()

Revert the effect of clean_column_names()

Miscellaneous

check_crucial_names()

Check if a named object contains expected names

degrees()

Insert the symbol for degrees

dropbox_exists()

Does this computer have a local copy of 2dii's dropbox folder?

path_examples() path_example()

Paths to example data installed in any package at .libPaths()

r2dii_packages()

Return a vector giving the name of r2dii packages
